channel.title: Slow or jerky movements while using Aryan
channel.description:
I have had this problem since I've been using Aryan. IN runescape my char runs and walks fine. Everytime I use Aryan my player my player moves a little stop then surges froward. Very jerky like. I have a 2 Gig processor 512 memory so hardware isn't the problem. I have tried reload the operating systems (Windows Xp pro) with no change.
Does anyone know if any other thing I can check to get my char to act normally when I use Aryan?

item.title: Slow or jerky movements while using Aryan
item.dc:creator: @edycus edycus
item.description:
@edycus wrote:

Not running a proxy at all and not running any kind of file sharing program. It can just be me on the Internet by myself, not running a proxy, and still I will have the jerky motion when I use Aryan. Regular Runesacpe works fine. Aryan my man moves with a jerfy montion. Any more suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Slow or jerky movements while using Aryan

item.description:
@xPLaR wrote:

yeah its to do with your internet. mine runs fine usually but if i run torrents then it does what you explained.
